# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

reasoning:
**The Shop Decision: Mega Arcana Pack Over Planet Card**

Alright, let's break this down. Ante 5, Round 10. The Boss blind is coming up, the Head, which debuffs all Spades. Currently, I have $9 to spend. I'm holding Ancient Joker (Spade suit), two Hanging Chads, Smeared Joker, and Stuntman. The Smeared Joker is key here: it makes Spades and Clubs interchangeable. This is useful because my Ancient Joker cares about suit, and if I play a Club, it will "count" as a Spade due to Smeared Joker, thus triggering the Ancient Joker's multiplier, without being debuffed by The Head.

I see two options in the shop: Earth, which levels up Full House (Level 5->6) and costs $3, and the Mega Arcana Pack, which costs $8. I also see a Jumbo Standard Pack for $6. Let's think through this logically. Buying Earth will leave me with $6. I can't then buy the Mega Arcana pack. If I buy the Mega Arcana pack first, I'm left with $1. Buying Earth is not an option.

The Mega Arcana pack has a higher potential value than Earth plus a Standard pack. Tarot cards are powerful. While Earth boosts my Full House, I've been focusing on Flushes lately, which are easier to make, especially with the Smeared Joker's help. I need to keep in mind the Boss's debuff on Spades. If I can get a card that converts suits, or gives money, the Mega Arcana pack is more useful.

Buying Earth and then a Jumbo Standard Pack for $6 isn't going to be as useful as getting two Tarot effects. The Mega Arcana pack is the way to go.

So, I will select the Mega Arcana Pack.

Final decision: I will use the command `buy_booster 2`.

Just one more check: The user instructions specify a JSON format. I need an action.
`{"action": "buy_booster", "positions": [2]}`
